summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 629 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1580 m), and light levels (up 3872 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
